titleStmt.title: A full relation of the passages concerning the late treaty for a peace, begun at Vxbridge January 30. 1644.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by His Majesties command at Oxford, by Leonard Lichfield printer to the Vniversity.,

notesStmt.note: "His Maiesties answers to certain papers, delivered to his commissioners at Vxbridge, upon the close of the treaty" has a separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "May 5th". Annotation on Huntington copy: "23: Apr. 1645".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
